message: I have a unique and valuable product that I think you'll be interested in. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $9000. How about we compromise at $11000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $10500?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go below my initial price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $11500?
I'm getting close to my budget limit, but I'm still not comfortable with $11500. Can you try $11200?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go below $11500. How about we meet at $11300?
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with $11300. Can you try $11000?
